abstracts.cdata!:
The Bhutan Second Development Policy
            Grant (DPG2) aims to carry forward the objectives o f the
            first operation, helping Bhutan to: (a) enhance the delivery
            of public services by strengthening fiscal management, (b)
            increase the effectiveness of public spending by improving
            financial management and procurement processes, (c) create
            better income earning opportunities by improving the
            investment climate, facilitating greater labor market
            flexibility, and increasing foreign direct investment, (d)
            raise educational attainment, particularly in previously
            under served areas, by expanding access to high quality
            education services, and (e) reduce maternal mortality by
            increasing the number of births delivered in health facilities.
